Posts.Title: petition the government to continue Kadcyla for breast cancer patients...

Posts.Content: Godd luck for today i hope it goes smoothly for you  Maria  xxxx
Posts.Title: Here goes...first day of chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Ruthie I had that decision to make yesterday and decided to go with the chemo . The way it was explained to me was that there were 3 groups of cancer results  then ones that had a 1% chance of it coming back then the middle group who had a 10% chance of it coming back then the high risk group who had 20% chance of it coming back . I am in the middle group  my thoughts are I have young kids and a amazing husband and I want to be around to spend the rest of my life with them .Yes it may well be a rough 6 months for me but at least I know I have done everything I can to make sure I am here for as long as possible. I know for some its a difficult decision but for me it was a no brainer , I feel that with how much chemo must cost the nhs they wouldn't offer it to people it they didn't feel it was necessary . Good luck with your decision I hope you make the right one for yourself Maria x
Posts.Title: Oncotype results and should I have chemo?

Posts.Content: I went public on my facebook too and found it alot easier then telling people one to one but you have to do whats right for you . Maria xx

Posts.Title: Finished at last!!!!

Posts.Content: Aww poor you I hope the operation goes well. Its all the waiting that's the worse . Maria x
Posts.Title: so I have had the operation

Posts.Content: well I am pleased to say I had my lump removed yesterday , I believe it all went well . My nodes were cleared which I am thrilled to bits about . I am pretty sore and bruised today but still have both my boobs so that's a bonus . Stupid question but am I now not classed as a cancer patient as the lump has been removed , have been told I still need to do the 18 chemo sessions etc but if its been taken out surely the plans will be changed wont they ???  Or am I just being a stupid arse ??? I hope everyone else is well and that things are going well for you all Maria xxxx
Posts.Title: so I have had the operation

Posts.Content: I am just thinking if the margins are clear does that mean I won't have to have all the chemo stuff . I'm am proberly jumping the gun again and just need to sit and wait for the appointment in 2 weeks and go from there .  I'm sorry you have to go back for another operation I hope it goes well for you  Xxx
Posts.Title: so I have had the operation

Posts.Title: Joining December chemo club.

Posts.Content: I am so sorry I put my post on the wrong page , hugs to all Maria xx
Posts.Title: Joining December chemo club.

Posts.Content: Hi All Lots of great ideas thanks for sharing ladies , I have made a little list . Where do you get the dilute bicarbonate of soda mouth wash from or how do you make it ? I have order a couple of wolly hats for when I am out walking my dogs but still have to find the bamboo ones . Does anyone have the link to the oct chemo group please , I don't think I will be joining until Nov but from what I have read before lots of good tips and advice on there . Maria x
Posts.Title: Preparing for chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Cocopops I just wanted to stop by and say hi and welcome and good luck for your tests and I'm sorry a out the loss of your nan. I am 4 weeks ahead of you  but this group as been so amazing with support . Maria x
Posts.Title: Scary times ahead

Posts.Content: Do any of you keep a personal diary of your journey  to write down all your true feeling be they good or bad . I am reading a good book called " even the eyebrows" and it just got me kind of thinking about a diary of my own  so that when this crazy rollercoaster stops I will be able to look back and  be proud of how I've done laugh at the up and shed a tear at the downs . Maria x
Posts.Title: Keep a diary

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for all your support I am very grateful .  I'm still all over the place   and to top it off the heating had broken down so I may just sit on the floor and sob I think .
Posts.Title: I think the poop has hit the fan

Posts.Content: Thanks Julia I don't feeling like i'm doing great . I feel really lost at the moment . In one way I don't think I would want to re read all that I am due to go through but then in another maybe in years to come when i'm having a bad day I could think pffff this is nothing compared to what I have been through . This waiting for the next results is just  driving me crazy everytime I open my eyes its like i'm one sleep closer to it . When this is all over does life go back to normal or is it never the same again are you always wondering will it strike you again or will it be gone for good ? Maria x
Posts.Title: Keep a diary

Posts.Content: I'm stood here in my kitchen  at 3.45 in the morning balling my eyes out.   Don't know if any of you watch Hollyoaks and saw last night's offering . The girls hair has upset me so much as it's just made me think that is what I may well look like soon  and I know  that's really shallow of Me as hair of nothing if you have survival.  I don't know what kind of cancer she has pretty sure it isn't bc but it's just hit a huge nerve  with me  the whole her treatment isn't  working and her cancer has spread . I am looking at a  picture of my dad who passed away suddenly a year ago and I'm just wanting to talk to him so much and what him to tell me I'm going to be ok and I'm strong enough to deal with this  I don't feel strong today.   Yes it's a why me moment I guess
Posts.Title: I think the poop has hit the fan

Posts.Content: Thank you Karen . I have  had a good ole cry with my hubby and he says if I was strong all the time he would be worried  he knows me too well . I know your right about the tv actress and I norm cant watch funerals on soaps as they set me off every time so now I had something else to set me off too .Maybe I need to read the tv mags on a Saturday so I have a forewarning of what's going to happen . When the realism does kick in its so scary , I am a positive person most the time but I guess I am allowed to have my weepy moments . Maria x
Posts.Title: I think the poop has hit the fan

Posts.Content: Thanks for all the thoughts on comments on the keeping a diary subject , anyone know how to do a blog on line ? I can do email,ebay,facebook and amazon but that's about my limit . Maria
Posts.Title: Keep a diary
